ch0089_10_n/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], I was waiting for you
to come.
ch0089_10_n/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m looking forward to the chemical reactions you
will create here on Pasio.
ch0089_10_n/7101_0701_01_10:
Do you know what kind of strength you need to
change the world?
ch0089_10_n/7101_0701_02_10: It’s the strength of your heart.
ch0089_10_n/7101_0701_03_10:
I met Hilbert and his friends, and in learning about
their hearts and feelings...
ch0089_10_n/7102_0701_01_10:
I think sygna suits have the power to strengthen
the bond of a sync pair.
ch0089_10_n/7102_0701_02_10:
Kyurem and the others seem to be happy to look
just like me.
ch0089_10_n/7103_0701_01_10:
When sync pairs meet, a Pokémon battle will
begin naturally.
ch0089_10_n/7103_0701_02_10:
I think it’s a formula we use to deeply
understand one another.
ch0089_10_n/7104_0701_01_10:
When I first saw Kyurem and Zekrom fuse,
I was very surprised.
ch0089_10_n/7104_0701_02_10:
It was a formula I’d never seen before, but
I decided to accept it.
ch0089_10_n/7104_0701_03_10: In doing so, the world opened up to me.
ch0089_10_n/7105_0701_01_10:
When Pokémon and people with different ideas
gather together, the world will create a beautiful
chemical reaction.
ch0089_10_n/7105_0701_02_10:
I hope my relationship with you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ], becomes a part of
this precious world, too.
ch0089_10_n/1701_0701_01_10: I want to give you something. Will you accept it?
ch0089_10_n/1701_0702_01_10: I believe you’ll use it well.
ch0089_10_n/2501_0701_01_10:
When Hilbert entrusted Kyurem to me, I got this
feeling that...I can’t explain very well.
ch0089_10_n/2501_0701_03_10:
Have you ever felt this way when you traded
a Pokémon with someone?
ch0089_10_n/2501_0701_04_10:
When I was in Unova, there were times when I
would ask my Pokémon friends for help.
ch0089_10_n/2501_0701_05_10:
But once the battle was over, I would return them
back to the wild, and I never thought of
trading them with someone.
ch0089_10_n/2501_0702_01_10:
Trainers don’t just exchange their Pokémon friends
during a trade.
ch0089_10_n/2501_0702_02_10:
The gift they give each other is everything they
feel for their Pokémon, too.
ch0089_10_n/2511_0701_01_10:
By being with Pokémon, people venture into
unknown worlds.
ch0089_10_n/2511_0701_02_10:
By being with people, Pokémon can unleash their
true power...
ch0089_10_n/2511_0701_03_10:
You can walk along the same path together,
working together to find a better answer amidst
your worries and troubles...
ch0089_10_n/2511_0701_04_10:
If you do that, the formulas that create this world
may become even more beautiful and colorful.
ch0089_10_n/2511_0702_01_10:
Pokémon and people meet one another because
they need each other.
ch0089_10_n/2511_0702_02_10:
Perhaps all sync pairs were able to meet each
other because it was just meant to be.
ch0089_10_n/3001_0701_01_10:
No matter where you are in the world, the sunrise
is truly breathtaking. It lifts my spirits.
ch0089_10_n/3003_0701_01_10:
The time I spend on Pasio is very rewarding.
I treasure every moment.
ch0089_10_n/3005_0701_01_10:
The sun’s gone down. When you head off to bed,
I hope you have a good night’s rest.
